name: listofallconstructorswithinaraceinayear
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool formula_1_fixed.
Tool description: F1
API description: This endpoint is to obtain a list of all constructors in a particular race(round) of a season(year)

year.description: The year of the Formula 1 season.

round.description: The specific race (round) within the season.
